result.title: Bark content
result.content:
A Bark can be anything you want it to be! A question, something you found interesting or even a joke.

Barks are assigned Tags which define who will hear you Bark. Tags allow you and others to search for content in a particular content in the site.

Please Note: Plese be mindful and only tag your Bark where you want it to be heard. There's no point in Barking about your tastiest steak yet under the tag vegitarian

At Bark we promote a positive atmosphere. Please keep this in mind when barking.

result.title: Tags, Tags, Tags
result.content: Add tags that are keywords associated with your Bark. Tagsare limited to 30 characters and don't require the leading '@' sign
